references.paper_title: Identify Then Recommend: Towards Unsupervised Group Recommendation
references.reason: This is the main research paper, introducing a novel unsupervised group recommendation framework.
This paper is frequently cited and proposes an attentive group recommendation approach, a common method improved upon in the main paper.

references.paper_title: ConsRec: Learning consensus behind interactions for group recommendation
references.reason: This paper is used as a strong baseline for comparison and proposes the ConsRec model, a method that the main paper improves upon.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical hyperedge embedding-based representation learning for group recommendation
references.reason: This paper is a state-of-the-art model in group recommendation which uses hyperedge embeddings, a technique considered and improved upon by the main paper.
This paper is a foundational paper in collaborative filtering using neural networks, a technique that forms the basis of many group recommendation approaches.
